summary: DEFAULT_CELEBRATION_IMAGE was updated to point at the new static asset path, but the required new image file itself is not shown as added in the diff. The modal component also appears to include additional cleanup/logic changes beyond the requested default-image swap.

missing_requirements.requirement: Add the new default image file to frontend/public/assets/generated with the exact filename celebration-default-selfieGirl.dim_696x609.png.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff summary shows no added files, so there is no evidence the new static asset was added under frontend/public/assets/generated.

hallucinated_features.description: Additional modal logic changes unrelated to swapping the default image (e.g., object URL detection/revocation and expanded cleanup/reset behavior on close/unmount).
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest only asked to change the default image reference and add the asset file; it explicitly listed non-goals around changing the selfie/camera/upload flows, and these logic changes go beyond a simple asset swap.
evidence: frontend/src/components/MonthlyCompletionCelebrationModal.tsx (adds isObjectURL helper, URL.revokeObjectURL cleanup effects, expanded modal-close reset logic)
